title: Uchi No Banri Ga Osewa Ni Narimasu
alternative_title: ウチの万李がお世話になります ; Our Banri will be in your care
status: ウチの万李がお世話になります ; Our Banri will be in your care
description:
Description :
        Nanase, a university student, is forced by unavoidable circumstances to work as a temporary manager for hotshot actor Narita Banri. On the outside, Banri is an attractive, refreshing, and good-natured young man. However, behind the scenes, he is a mischievous and arrogant celebrity towards his management. Nanase and Banri clashes heads every second they spend alone together, but they never forget to act cheerful and professional in public. Could there be any romantic feelings behind all their ruthless bickering?
